result.execSummary:
The defendant Jessica Marie Foster was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-False Representation <=$2500 [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

records.addlTxt: Cover Letter from DOC to Br. 1

Defendant Jessica Marie Foster in court.  Michael X. Albrecht appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State gives status.  Restitution has been paid in full.  State has no objection to discharge from probation at discharge date.  Request remaining costs be ordered as a civil judgment.  Defendant agrees.  Costs to be converted to civil judgment.

records.descr: Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jessica Marie Foster in court with attorney Melville Peter Middleton.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   State gives recommedation.  Attorney Middleton agrees.  Victim statement reviewed by defendant.  Defendant agrees and understands. No Contest Plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court. finds Defendant guilty.  Court withholds sentence.
Count 1:
12 months Probation
Undergo any counseling per agent.
$185.90 Restitution, includes 10% Surcharge-- JOINT/SEVERAL.  Set up monthly payment amount with probation agent.  
$243.00 costs & $200.00 DNA surcharge & Supervision Fees (PAID THRU PROBATION)
Paperwork handed in court.
Return date on April 8, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Melville Peter Middleton in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Auth filed and approved.  Matter has not been pre-tried.  Request return date.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for April 8, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference on February 27, 2015 at 10:15 am.
Return date on March 10, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Jessica Marie Foster in court.  Dennis Joseph Ryan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint. Advised rights to an attorney, waived today only.  File set for pre-trial conference/return date.  Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 27, 2015 at 10:15 am.  Return date scheduled for March 10, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
